devdoc.details: ERC1155 token contract designed for research papers funding and distribution.      This contract allows researchers to receive funding in exchange for NFT units,       representing a stake in their research project.

ERC1155InsufficientBalance(address,uint2.details: Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.balance: Current balance for the interacting account.
params.needed: Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC1155InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC1155InvalidArrayLength(uint256,uint25.details: Indicates an array length mismatch between ids and values in a safeBatchTransferFrom operation. Used in batch transfers.

params.idsLength: Length of the array of token identifiers
params.valuesLength: Length of the array of token amounts

ERC1155InvalidOperator(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC1155InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC1155InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC1155MissingApprovalForAll(address,add.details: Indicates a failure with the `operator`s approval. Used in transfers.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.
params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `account` grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer their tokens, according to `approved`.

Funded(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the paper receives funding.

params.mintedUnits: The number of NFT units minted in exchange for the funding.

ReferencePaper(address,address).details: Emitted when a reference to another paper is created.

params.to: The address of the referenced paper.

TransferBatch(address,address,address,ui.details: Equivalent to multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all transfers.

TransferSingle(address,address,address,u.details: Emitted when `value` amount of tokens of type `id` are transferred from `from` to `to` by `operator`.

URI(string,uint256).details: Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI. If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the Paper contract.

params._baseFundingPrice: The base funding price in wei required to mint one NFT unit.
params._initialuri: Initial URI for the token metadata.
params._referenceRoyalty: The percentage of the funding to be distributed as royalties.
params._references: List of addresses representing referenced papers.

exists(uint256).details: Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not.

fund().details: The number of NFT units minted is based on the amount of ETH sent.       A portion of the funding is distributed as royalties to referenced papers.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

publishPaper(string).details: This function can only be called once by the owner.

params._newuri: The new URI to set for the token metadata.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: Calls the internal _distributeAuthorRoyalty function after transfer.

params.amounts: An array containing the amount of each token being transferred.
params.data: Additional data with no specified format.
params.ids: An array containing the IDs of each token being transferred.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Calls the internal _distributeAuthorRoyalty function after transfer.

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred.
params.data: Additional data with no specified format.

totalSupply(uint256).details: Total value of tokens in with a given id.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uri(uint256).details: This function is overridden to retrieve the URI from the ERC1155URIStorage extension.

params.id: The token ID for which the URI is being requested.

returns._0: The URI string for the token metadata.

devdoc.title: Paper

baseFundingPrice().notice: The base funding price in wei required to mint one NFT unit.

fund().notice: Allows users to fund the research project in exchange for NFT units.

publishPaper(string).notice: Updates the URI for the token metadata.

referenceBalances(address).notice: Maps referenced paper addresses to their accumulated royalty balances.

referenceRoyalty().notice: The percentage of the funding to be distributed as royalties to referenced papers.

references(uint256).notice: List of addresses representing referenced papers.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Batch transfer function overridden to include author royalty distribution.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Safe transfer function overridden to include author royalty distribution.

uri(uint256).notice: Returns the URI for the token metadata.
